Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2018 03:01PM smarchez wrote: Hi Connie1230 I hope you’re doing well. I also have brachioradial pruritis. It has got much worse since I have started taking Arimidex but I can’t find anything that confirms this online. I wondered whether you might know of any support groups where I could discuss this with someone or find others ho have experienced similar? Many thanks, smarchez
